thread.title: Brendon McNiven

author: Brendon McNiven
title: Brendon McNiven
text:
Ordered Windows 10 and not straightforward to download. When I did it created a virtual drive on my computer. The boot up USB I created did not work like previous windows installations I have done. I know a bit about computers but am not an expert. In exasperation I hit a wrong format button and stuffed my computer.
Game Cheap made contact after I registered a complaint, were very understanding and issued a full refund. I have expected it to be a cumbersome process as I am in Australia, they are in the US - pleasantly surprised and would not hesitate to use them again.
